thoughts.text: To start developing the web app, I need to set up the environment first. I'll create a directory for the project.
thoughts.reasoning: Before starting the development of any project, it's important to have a dedicated workspace. This helps in organizing the project files and resources efficiently.
thoughts.plan:
- Create a project directory
- Install necessary libraries and frameworks
- Start developing the web app
thoughts.criticism: I should have a clear plan on how to structure the project files and directories. This will help in maintaining the project in the long run.
thoughts.speak: I'm going to start by setting up the project workspace.
